location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage; a hole in the folio has slightly obscured the address, however the intended recipient can still be clearly identified.

mods.abstract: The letter conveys information regarding the sale of the remaining bales of wool at the Bushire factory to Hudjee Mossain. An itemised list of the wool sold is enclosed.
